com.pb.locationintelligence.geoenhance

Interface GeoEnhanceService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GeoEnhanceServiceImpl

    public interface GeoEnhanceService
    This service provides Point of Interests for an address or location coordinate

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Accepts longitude and latitude and returns an Address for that location

    • Method Detail

      • getAddress

        void getAddress(android.content.Context context,
              java.lang.Double latitude,
              java.lang.Double longitude,
              java.lang.Float searchRadius,
              java.lang.String searchRadiusUnit,
              RequestObserver<GeoEnhanceResponse> requestObserver)
        Accepts longitude and latitude and returns an Address for that location
        Parameters:
        context - Required - Android Context
        latitude - Required - Latitude of the location
        longitude - Required - Longitude of the location
        searchRadius - Optional - Search Radius, in feet. Default Value is 150 feet, Allowed range is 0- 5280 feet
        searchRadiusUnit - Optional - Unit used for searchRadius. Allowed values are FEET,METERS,MILES,KILOMETERS (Case insensitive)
        requestObserver - Required - Asynchronous request observer

      • getPlace

        void getPlace(android.content.Context context,
            java.lang.Double latitude,
            java.lang.Double longitude,
            java.lang.Integer levelHint,
            RequestObserver<GeoEnhanceResponse> requestObserver)
        Parameters:
        context - Required - Android Context
        latitude - Required - latitude of the location
        longitude - Required - longitude of the location
        levelHint - Optional - Level of Information. Below are the numeric codes for geographic hierarchy level: LEVEL 1 = Country LEVEL 2 = State or equivalent LEVEL 3 = District or equivalent LEVEL 4 =City or Town LEVEL 5 = Locality LEVEL 6 = Neighbourhood If not provided, returns the lowest geographic hierarchy level information available
        requestObserver - Required - Asynchronous request observer

      • getPOI

        void getPOI(android.content.Context context,
          java.lang.Double latitude,
          java.lang.Double longitude,
          java.lang.String category,
          java.lang.Integer maxCandidates,
          java.lang.Float searchRadius,
          java.lang.String searchRadiusUnit,
          java.lang.String searchDataset,
          java.lang.String searchPriority,
          RequestObserver<GeoEnhanceResponse> requestObserver)
        Retrieves Point of Interests (POI) around the given location.
        Parameters:
        context - Required - Android Context
        latitude - Required - latitude of the location
        longitude - Required - longitude of the location
        category - Optional - Category or Sub-Category to refine the POI search results
        maxCandidates - Optional - Maximum number of POIs that will be returned. Default is 10
        searchRadius - Optional - Search Radius, in miles. Default Value is 2 miles, Allowed range is 0-50 miles
        searchRadiusUnit - Optional - Unit used for searchRadius. Allowed values are FEET,METERS,MILES,KILOMETERS (Case insensitive)
        searchDataset - Optional - Comma-separated input of dataSet names ('PBData' for searching in PB Data).
        searchPriority - Optional - Define priority while searching on DataSets. Allowed values are Y/N.
        requestObserver - Required - Asynchronous request observer

      • getTimezone

        void getTimezone(android.content.Context context,
               java.lang.String timestamp,
               java.lang.Double latitude,
               java.lang.Double longitude,
               RequestObserver<TimezoneResponse> requestObserver)
        Retrieves timezone details asynchronously for the given latitude and longitude.
        Parameters:
        context - Required - Android Context
        latitude - Required - latitude of the location
        longitude - Required - longitude of the location
        timestamp - Required - timestamp
        requestObserver - Required - Asynchronous request observer
